Reviews.Title: “Expensive”
Reviews.Author: Mahyar B
Reviews.Content: hotel beds tiny stayed 6 nights breakfast everyday staff absolutely rude helpless placed quiet near underground station simply walk istiklal street easy airport bus taksim costs 10 tl bus stop cross street youll hotel

Reviews.Title: “For sure not a 4 stars hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Travelz0r
Reviews.Content: 3 star hotel hotel location taksim walk restaurants shops etc werent clean hotel nasty smell entering hotel staff werent talking english lights weak bad look hotel pool dirty rules werent respected people diving clothes terrible im hotels region

Reviews.Title: “Where Turkish Airlines sends their stranded passengers”
Reviews.Author: raobert
Reviews.Content: 4 stars hotel lot people istanbul landed 2 nights thy flight paid board fortunately inspection discovered price 235 eurnight breakfast included ridiculous price service offered soso microscopic windows overheated locked airco bathroom nice breakfast treat staff friendly free wifi slow

Reviews.Title: “Decent accomodation, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: senkayu
Reviews.Content: hotel located 50 taksim square commercial center istanbul streets restaurants cafes souvenir shops walk hill yourself busy shopping zone taksim istikal street pedestrians zone kilometers walk enjoying joy city beating street hotel regular check ina procedure faster breakfast ok stuff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Needs a helping hand”
Reviews.Author: Irishgirlabroad
Reviews.Content: booked supposed 4 hotel turkish airlines 2 nights cancelled flight located taksim square bus metro services doorstep staff reasonably friendly helpful appeared clean hotel charm left luggage depot walk door cant help feeling emotion expect checking inthe lobby depressing lack lighting help half lights floor restaurant lacklustre lighting appropriate bus station sit meal day arrived lunch ate sit own empty dining particularly restaurants standard narrow claustrophobic reception offer alternative 8th floor lot term light balcony outside offered views town bosphorus locked bed unfortunately straw sheet fit bed duvet top edge mattress luckily heating otherwise cold moment bedthe duvet stop covering amenities offered bar soap hand basin bathroom shower apparent piece soap bathroom external ventilation tiny sewing kit desk drawer minibar seen days clean inside cabinet carpeted bit straw underfoot lifts dark hallway carpets looked replacing pool sauna hamman dark worn extent 10tl additional charge sauna appearance managed people customer service bed hotel near taksim square passes test dont expect bare minimum

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: Karin S
Reviews.Content: istanbul conference advised staying crystal hotel reviews expecting hotel 5 min walk taksim square arrived pleasantly surprised decent size beds pillows comfortable bathroom except shower bath glass door loved people difficult getting bath normal breakfast found istanbul pretty affordable happy breakfast else recommend taking breakfast highly recommend hotel true traveller meaning clean safe rest time

Reviews.Title: “Terrible overpriced hotel! Don't believe their internet pictures!”
Reviews.Author: Cath1980
Reviews.Content: positive aspects nice location easy connection rest city free wifi 247 negative aspects reception staff friendly nor helpfull tiny lucky window bad sound isolation specially near elevators clean overpriced called 4 stars hotel bad service breakfast dirty tables poor quality food drinks

Reviews.Title: “This so called 4 star rated Hotel is worst then any 2 star rated hotel from any metro city in India”
Reviews.Author: RocksyRocks
Reviews.Content: imagine 4 star hotel 1 doesnt believe providing tea kettles star rated hotels india including guest houses provides 2 breakfast spread resembles community kitchen dont bother food items name tags people identify eating idea veg veg items 3 health club 1000 am 4 refuse provide iron box proudly suggest laundry service 4 top highly staff pick phone consider self lucky dont bang phone fail communicate requirement obviously expect learn language visiting staff dont understand english luckier succeeded explaining requirement service requested request clean water glass please dont wait

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in istanbul, Excellent service,location and value”
Reviews.Author: Johnetem
Reviews.Content: moment walked hotel home staff helpful friendlythe location excellent walked major sites restaurants minutes walk didnt leave breakfast beyond touring daythe nicely neat bathroom bed

Reviews.Title: “Not Satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: Vdawar
Reviews.Content: hotel crystal situated square location hotel awesome reason stay satisfactory due uncomfortable start feeling choked inside hotel time preferred sitting lobby finally decided change hotel hotel staff hotel didnt charge cancelling days reservation hotel staff helpful friendly

Reviews.Title: “definitely not more than 2 stars, believe me, avoid it, and the fire escape is more dangerous than the fire itself”
Reviews.Author: TehranFarzaneh
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 friends 6 nights triple door restaurant believe window bare damp 2 holes opposite walls couldnt day night objected 8th floor terrible noise airconditioning plant 24 hours reception guy unresponsive complaints charged triple double third bed makeshift 2 towels glasses didnt brought third towel 5 days insisted triple standard fresh fruits breakfast 2 stars bloody experience shopping sultan ahmet cosy expensive hotel fire escape blocked door stairs removed door railing narrow dangerous descend especially times emergency hurry

Reviews.Title: “Definitely not 4 Star”
Reviews.Author: RKB1952
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel vacation turkey travel agent booked offering choices internet selected appeared hotel location superb especially indians indian restaurent situated adjacent hotel hotel situated taksim considered centre lareg class restaurents local eating joints fast food centres coffee houses shopping streets five ten minutes walking distance unfortunately hotel below standard expect star property coffee maker soap bar shared occupants basic toilet items toothbrushpaste body lotion conditioner etc run central airconditioning thier own system regardless guests comfortable visit istanbul choose hotel

Reviews.Title: “aweful”
Reviews.Author: pouya_10
Reviews.Content: am wondering hotel 4 star begining reception rude impolite dont speak english turkey dont friendly feeling guests check aweful own havent natural light air window breakfast normal prefect ok city taksim squre metro bus mini bus shopping near street etc

Reviews.Title: “Crystal hotel, breakfast is Ok but dinner is not.”
Reviews.Author: RMCYR
Reviews.Content: hotel close metro buses square lots shops cafes bars close spiral stairs difficult elevators slow staff testy understand minimal english frustrated easily water expensive outside pick bottle 50 cents cant sleep morning close mosque broadcast prayers sun comes sounds saying rugs stained bath tub pulled wall moldy grout breakfasts milk soured clumpy coffee dinner hotel dry chicken rice potato yellow colored stay location shop priced hotels near definitely dinner

Reviews.Title: “Good location but that's it ...”
Reviews.Author: Arindam G
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel near taksim square 5 nights june 2010 hotel excellent location otherwise drawbacks faced boarders reading past reviews hotel trip advisor unfortunately proved true hotel airconditioning functional liquid soap provided toiletries average uninspiring decor ordinary breakfast doen justify 4 star rating hotel hotel definitely value money recommend unless predicament planning trip hour alternatives available

Reviews.Title: “unforgettable trip”
Reviews.Author: daryoush-d
Reviews.Content: family spent 7 days hotel clean little comfort silent nights breakfast pretty fresh hotel istanbul travelers spend times inside city reach fast touristic excellent option trip

Reviews.Content: stay 4 nights clean excellent locationnear metro taksim squarethe breakfast ok pool day chek bad aircondition wifi conection day 3rd day connection
